metadata.name: Suspicious Scheduled Task Write to System32 Tasks
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of tasks from processes executed from suspicious locations

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\tasks')) AND (contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\\\perflogs')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\config\\\\systemprofile'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of tasks from processes executed from suspicious locations

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
